text: Tell me to look at the picture and tell me everything that you see going on in that picture. Tell me everything that you see happening now. Look down to talk to me? Uh huh. The little girl is saying, oh, the little boy is getting the cookies out of the cookie jar. And while he has one, he's getting some more. He's going to fall off the... the... . what do you call it? I can't think what you call it.
